sentences.en: A company present meeting most reverent heart is the customer ordering, transports goods.
sentences.cn: 公司目前会一最虔诚的心为客户定货, 走货.

sentences.en: A reverent hush descended on the multitude.
At first a reverent hush. Then a murmuring.
sentences.cn: 首先是一片肃静, 接着响起一片低语声.

sentences.en: Be reverent before each dawning day.
sentences.cn: 要对到来的每一天充满敬意.

sentences.en: He gave reverent attention to the teacher.
If love is one belief then, reverent person can be happy.
sentences.cn: 如果爱情是一种信仰,那么虔诚悳人就会幸福快乐.

sentences.en: Now reverent silence reigns only after closing time.
sentences.cn: 而现在这里只有在关门以后才拥有虔诚的寂静.

sentences.en: Reverent but prejudicial Ancestor Worship - one of China's immense Cemeteries, which seriously lessen her productive land area.
sentences.cn: 一片巨大的中国人墓地,对祖先的崇敬,但会减少他们可耕种的土地.

sentences.en: She said the word artist with a gentle, understanding, reverent smile.
sentences.cn: 她说作家一词时面带高雅, 理解和虔诚的微笑.

sentences.en: The hot and the cold. The left and the right. The reverent and the irreverent!
sentences.cn: 神是上与下、热与冷、左与右、虔诚与不敬!

sentences.en: The long - dead artisan had made Eahlstan humble and reverent, but had also made him bold.
sentences.cn: 死去很久的这位艺术家,把Eahlstan雕刻得谦逊又虔诚, 同时也使他看上去很勇敢.

sentences.en: The nurse treated the patients with almost reverent kindness.
sentences.cn: 这位护士以近乎崇敬的亲切态度对待病人.

sentences.en: Then Yangzi's attitude is fairly reverent.
sentences.cn: 这时的阳子其态度是挺恭敬的.

sentences.en: They all maintained a reverent silence.

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的；表示尊敬的；可尊敬的

trans.tran_en: showing a lot of respect and admiration
